Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: U
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Type of the delegate thenable

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: thenable
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Delegate thenable for this CancellableThenable

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: cancelContext
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: The CancelContext associated with this CancellableThenable

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: cancelItems
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Tracks the cancel items for this CancellableThenable. These items are removed from the associated CancelContext when the thenable resolves.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: appendCancellableTask(task:reject:)
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Append the task and reject function for a cancellable task to the cancel context

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: appendCancelContext(from:)
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Append the cancel context associated with from to our cancel context. Typically from is a branch of our chain.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: cancel(error:file:function:line:)
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: Cancel all members of the promise chain and their associated asynchronous operations.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: isCancelled
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: True if all members of the promise chain have been successfully cancelled, false otherwise.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: cancelAttempted
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: True if cancel has been called on the CancelContext associated with this promise, false otherwise. cancelAttempted will be true if cancel is called on any promise in the chain.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: cancelledError
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: The cancellation error generated when the promise is cancelled, or nil if not cancelled.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: then(on:_:)
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: The provided closure executes when this cancellable promise resolves. This allows chaining cancellable promises.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: thenCC(on:_:)
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.abstract: The provided closure executes when this cancellable promise resolves. This allows chaining promises and cancellable promises.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: map(on:_:)

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html#/s:19.name: get(on:_:)

Protocols/CancellableCatchMixin.html.name: CancellableCatchMixin

Protocols/CancellableTask.html.name: CancellableTask
Protocols/CancellableTask.html.abstract: Use this protocol to define cancellable tasks for CancellablePromise.

Protocols/CancellableThenable.html.name: CancellableThenable
Protocols/CancellableThenable.html.abstract: CancellableThenable represents an asynchronous operation that can be both chained and cancelled. When chained, all CancellableThenable members of the chain are cancelled when cancel is called on the associated CancelContext.

Classes/CancelContext.html.name: CancelContext
Classes/CancelContext.html.abstract: Keeps track of all promises in a promise chain with pending or currently running tasks, and cancels them all when cancel is called.

Classes.html#/s:19CancelForPromiseKit0A8.name: CancelItemList
Classes.html#/s:19CancelForPromiseKit0A8.abstract: Tracks the cancel items for a CancellablePromise. These items are removed from the associated CancelContext when the promise resolves.

Classes/CPKFinalizer.html.name: CPKFinalizer
Classes/CPKFinalizer.html.abstract: Cancellable finalizer returned from catch. Use finally to specify a code block that executes when the promise chain resolves.

Classes/CancellableGuarantee.html.name: CancellableGuarantee
Classes/CancellableGuarantee.html.abstract: A CancellableGuarantee is a functional abstraction around an asynchronous operation that can be cancelled but cannot error.

Classes/CancellablePromise.html.name: CancellablePromise
Classes/CancellablePromise.html.abstract: A CancellablePromise is a functional abstraction around a failable and cancellable asynchronous operation.
